title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 85.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 85.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part apply to all savings banks and
savings and loan associations which invest in the stock, capital notes and
debentures of service corporations. The authority contained in this Part shall
be in addition to any other lending or investment powers authorized by law or
regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
85.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
